job.title: Data & Applied Scientist
job.industry: Computer Hardware,Computer Software,Information Technology and Services
job.description: Are you interested in working on a state-of-art fraud detection system that protects billions of dollars in eCommerce transactions each year? Are you excited about working with talented engineers, investigators, and scientists on offline big data analytics, fending off ever-changing fraud attacks on daily basis? If so, please read on.  The Commerce Engineering Operations group is at the center of online purchase and signup experiences at Microsoft, including Xbox, Microsoft Store, Office 365, Azure, Microsoft Ads, Surface Warranty and more. These lines of business rely on our team to protect against fraud while also ensuring a great experience for genuine customers.  We are looking for a strong data scientist who is self-motivated and an excellent team player to manage the Risk system inline strategy for one or more of these businesses. The key focus is fraud data analytics, managing the automated rule strategy, and usage of our ML models, but the role is also part investigator, part program manager, part negotiator, and part firefighter. Creativity, passion, leadership, and tenacity are necessary traits. Each day the team is presented with situations that require unique and well considered responses to foil relentless fraud attacks. We are the front line of defense for Microsoftâ€™s large and growing ecommerce footprint. Because of this, we are looking for an ecommerce fraud expert with a strong data science background to join our team. Basic Qualifications: Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer.
